title: jaya dEvakI kishOra
sahitya:
jaya dEvakI kishOra.  rAgA:  nATa.  jhampa tALA.


1:  jaya dEvakI kishOra jaya kOTi smarAkAra jaya kAlindi taTa vihAra jaya gOpikAjAra jaya jaya
 caraNam 2    jaya muraLI gAnalOla jaya suvarNa ruci cEla jaya shalIla dhrta shaila jaya vArida nIla jaya jaya
 caraNam 3    jaya caritra dhutapApa jaya khaNDitAsurATOpa 
jaya pankaja nAbhAdhIsha jaya bhUmi ramEsha jaya jaya
